titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRAL EXCEEDING 28 DAYS TIME BAND CATEGORY (STANDARD) - Description

div.p: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRAL EXCEEDING 28 DAYS TIME BAND CATEGORY (STANDARD) is the same as attribute NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRAL EXCEEDING 28 DAYS TIME BAND CATEGORY Â for NHS Continuing Healthcare (Standard).
